problem_text:
K15
Sections of Concentric Convex Bodies

PROBLEM:
Suppose K′ and K are n-dimensional convex bodies with a common center of symmetry p. Suppose further that for each hyperplane H through p, the (n − 1)-dimensional area of the section K′ ∩ H is less than or equal to that of the section K ∩ H. Must the n-dimensional volume of K′ be less than or equal to that of K?
